data.text: @JohnDeFoorSr We aren't that big of babies. We are patriots and we wear a mask and get vaccinated if that is what it takes to get thru a pandemic. Plus, farmers are way to busy working to waste time doing this foolishness.
@wilddogranch Yea, it is far from being about farmers that is just a good tag line to get supporters.

@JohnDeFoorSr Besides the fact they are doing Putin's bidding by spouting divisive ignorance, They are funded by special interests.
 Thank You for your research Molly Conger! https://t.co/S48d3qiK11
@JohnDeFoorSr I am an American Farmer and I condemn this bullshit!
